WorkItem.Description:
Hi!


First of all, congrats on the brilliant add-on!
I just upgraded to the latest v2 and I realized a strange behavior: on the previous release, all the Javascript files were compressed to single-line ones and now it's not like that (I'm using YUI). HAve I missed anything important?
Thanks in advance.

kind regards,

Varalonga
WorkItem.Summary: YUI doesn't compress JavaScript in a single line anymore

Comments.Message:
Hi!

Thx for you feedback.
I checked out the options as you mentioned and the settings are the following:

Disable optimizations (NOT CHECKED)
Is obfuscate javascript (CHECKED)
Line Break position: 0
Preserve all semicolons (NOT CHECKED)


What should I tweak in order for YUI to compress all JS in a single line?
Thanks in advance.

Config line break position in config screen.

->tools
->Options
->Chirpy
-> Yui Js

** Closed by ploufs 04/14/2012 5:30PM

Hi!

Thx for you feedback.
I checked out the options as you mentioned and the settings are the following:

Disable optimizations (NOT CHECKED)
Is obfuscate javascript (CHECKED)
Line Break position: 0
Preserve all semicolons (NOT CHECKED)


What is exactly wrong with these settings?
What should I tweak in order to get YUI to compress all JS in a single line?
Thanks in advance.

Hi!


Sorry for the pressure, but I really need to know if it's possible to compress JS files (and maybe CSS files) to a single line. We're using many JS and CSS files, many of them with a considerable amount of lines, and this little detail can make the difference in the final size of the compressed file.
Thanks in advance and, once again, congrats for the awesome app!

kind regards,

Vitor

Thanks a lot! Worked like a charm!

keep on chirpying!
